title: Lumumba
writer: Pascal Bonitzer, Dan Edelstein (English dubbed version), Raoul Peck
actors: Eriq Ebouaney, Alex Descas, Théophile Sowié, Maka Kotto
plot: The true story of the rise to power and brutal assassination of the formerly vilified and later redeemed leader of the independent Congo, Patrice Lumumba. Using newly discovered historical ...
